channel.title: God Sword [From Scratch]
channel.description:
Well have been experimenting with Metaseq a bit and got this, all suggestions are welcome, don't be to harsh. I know all the color might be wrong but its my first try -.-
Dat maker view. [img]http://img97.imageshack.us/img97/4429/gsdat.jpg[/img]
Metaseq view: [img]http://img192.imageshack.us/img192/8541/gspolys.jpg[/img]

item.title: God Sword [From Scratch]
item.dc:creator: @wohuynia wohuynia
item.description:
@wohuynia wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:11, topic:339450”]This is very good for a trace. I feel the main difference between tracing and primitives is how easy primitives can be. If you have good fundamentals with drawing you can trace and make the faces look good will the move tool, but primitives makes it much easier to make a cylinder or whatever you need. wohuynia do what ever you like the best, but remember that primitives makes making models much easier.

Now about the model. I don’t really like the design that much. Just my opinion that it looks like a spider had sex with a sword and that was the outcome. But it is a very good model. 7/10.[/quote]

Spider had sex with sword lol ;DDDDDD

I really need to get off rude replys to the critics, thank you guys for your opinion ;D

Read full topic

item.title: God Sword [From Scratch]
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

This is very good for a trace. I feel the main difference between tracing and primitives is how easy primitives can be. If you have good fundamentals with drawing you can trace and make the faces look good will the move tool, but primitives makes it much easier to make a cylinder or whatever you need. wohuynia do what ever you like the best, but remember that primitives makes making models much easier.

Now about the model. I don’t really like the design that much. Just my opinion that it looks like a spider had sex with a sword and that was the outcome. But it is a very good model. 7/10.

Read full topic

item.title: God Sword [From Scratch]
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“wohuynia, post:5, topic:339450”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=435837.msg3201220#msg3201220 date=1273351695]
While this is an actual model, why don’t you try to branch away from JaGex’s idea’s.
Also, is this traced or prims?
[/quote]
HAND MADE FROM SCRATCH!!! no prims at all, JaGex’s idea?? what kinda idea??? i can picture the actual drawing on my note book for u to see that this is my idea.[/quote]

Godsword=JaGex’s idea. The name of this topic is "God Sword [From Scratch].
Try using prims. Your model will look better if you use prims, and you’ll use less faces.

Read full topic

item.title: God Sword [From Scratch]
item.dc:creator: @wohuynia wohuynia
item.description:
@wohuynia wrote:

rip4d:

You just set the priority setting in DatMaker to 10 then animate it accordingly. For drops use No Animation, and weapons use Right Hand.

thanks, that was the only thing missing for releasing my models ;D

Read full topic

item.title: God Sword [From Scratch]
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

You just set the priority setting in DatMaker to 10 then animate it accordingly. For drops use No Animation, and weapons use Right Hand.

item.title: God Sword [From Scratch]
item.dc:creator: @wohuynia wohuynia
item.description:
@wohuynia wrote:

rip4d:

For a trace this actually looks very good. If you can do this I’d like to see what you can do with primitives.

I could create anything from my head, but everything blows when i upload this to the game, no animations at the moment, don’t know how to set them up or just there is a secret how to set them manually that i don’t know.
For now ill do what i know and just gonna release previews of my work ;D

Read full topic
